channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Martin is in Swansea, along with a four-legged friend, to see a three-bed semi-detached house. We revisit a plot of land just outside Bolton in Lancashire that Martel first saw in 2019. Martel is also in Bishop Auckland, County Durham, to see a two-bed terrace with a very low-sounding guide price.
